name: onLongPressGesture(minimumDuration:maximumDistance:pressing:perform:)
desc: Adds an action to perform when this view recognizes a long press gesture.DeprecatedUse onLongPressGesture(minimumDuration:maximumDistance:perform:onPressingChanged:) instead.
declaration: func onLongPressGesture(minimumDuration: Double = 0.5, maximumDistance: CGFloat = 10, pressing: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil, perform action: @escaping () -> Void) -> some View
